growthexperiments-help-panel-suggesteded: Sɛ wobɛyɛ nsakraeɛ ahodoɔ pii, anaa wobɛkɔ so amia akyerɛkwan buruburu no so, na woatintim.
Sɛ wode nkekaaho pii bɛka ho, anaa wobɛtoa so amia akyerɛkwan buruburu no so ama no atintim.
Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ wode references/beae a wonyaa nsɛm no firii bebree bɛka ho, anaasɛ wobɛ mia "$1" no so ama amansan ahu {{GENDER:|your}} nsakrae!
Mfonin boa ma nnipa sua adeɛ, nanso atwerɛsɛm pii nni bi
{{GENDER:|Wo}} na wo bɛ kyerɛ sɛ yɛn fa mfoni bi nto Wikipedia so
Mfoni no fi Wikimedia Commons, beae a mfoni a wɔn gyɛ hwee wɔ ho a Wikipedia de yɛ adwuma.
Mfoni a {{GENDER:|wo}} gye to mu no, {{GENDER:|wo bɛ} kyerɛw asɛm kitiwa bi afa ho, na nea {{GENDER:|wo}} sesa yɛ no aba ama obia ɛhu.
